Accept POKER ACADEMY: UNLOCKING THE POTENTIAL OF LIMITS FOR POKER PLAYERS 1 The journey to higher limits in poker can be a long and challenging one. The slow rate of progress on limits is often due to the need to chase, which can slow down progress for several months or even more. 2 At Poker Academy, we offer an alternative. The Backing Fund allows you to independently increase your limits, regardless of chasing or swings in poker. The speed of progress on the limit is solely dependent on the current level of play, allowing you to maximize your potential and achieve success in poker. 3 Once a participant is ready to play at a higher limit, we provide the necessary conditions. These conditions enhance your chances of success in poker and enable you to climb the limits ladder with ease. 4 You can climb from NL20 to NL100 in just 2-3 months with consistent play and discipline. After the contract ends, you have the opportunity to play at middle limits and achieve success at those levels too! 5 In the Backing Fund, you don't need deposits. We finance your poker and provide the conditions necessary to move to the next limit. As a result, you can play each limit for just 2-3 weeks! NAVIGATING THE JOURNEY TO BECOME A MASTER POKER PLAYER WITH POKER ACADEMY 1 Embark on your journey to become a master poker player by unlocking the doors to our comprehensive training cabinet, filled with video recordings, statistics, and ideal playing conditions. 2 To progress to the next limit, you'll need to accumulate 5K hands of exceptional poker discipline. Once you've completed this task, sign up for an individual training session with our expert trainers. 3 Our trainers will carefully analyze your game by reviewing your homework and conducting online poker analysis. They'll provide you with personalized feedback and guidance to help you improve. 4 After every 10K hands, our trainers will assess your training base. If all tasks are completed to the highest standard, your balance will be replenished to play at the next limit. 5 Repeat this cycle of learning and progressing, and you'll become a master poker player with Poker Academy. Are you still hesitant to embark on your poker journey? Seize the opportunity to learn from the best in the school of poker, Poker Academy! No limit to the number of rooms! I accept privacy policy Get APP link Poker Academy Poker Academy, the renowned educational institution, strives to empower micro limit players in NL, PLO, and MTT tournament poker. Through its innovative educational approach, we revolutionize the poker world by cultivating the skills of aspiring players. Join us on this unprecedented journey and become a master of the game. Join our community and learn the secrets of their success. You'll have the opportunity to discuss any hands you've played with them and receive valuable tips to improve your game. Poker Academy is here to help you turn your poker career into a successful business. That's why we take care of everything from profitable deals to operational expertise. We even handle the player balancing and experience management, so you can focus on building your dream team and managing the training process. With full control over the fund, the decisions are entirely in your hands. Accept Privacy Policy Introduction This Privacy Policy explains how Poker Academy collects, uses, and shares personal information of users of this website. This policy is designed to help you understand what information we collect, how we use that information, and with whom we share it. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting it. However, please note that no data security system can be 100% secure, so while we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Personal Information Collection We collect personal information when you submit a form on our website. This information includes your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide voluntarily. We may also collect personal information from other sources, such as public records or data that you provide to us for marketing purposes. Personal Information Usage We use personal information to respond to your inquiries, provide our services, and to otherwise engage with you. We may also use your information to send you promotional materials, newsletters, and other communications. Additionally, we may use your information to analyze trends, administer our website, and to evaluate and improve our services. Personal Information Sharing We do not share personal information with third parties unless required by law. We may disclose personal information if we are required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or requests by public authorities. Cookies We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies as described in our Cookies Policy. Cookies allow us to provide you with personalized services, remember your preferences, and optimize our website for your experience. We may also use third-party cookies to track and analyze website usage and to deliver targeted advertisements. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Your continued use of our website after the posting of any updates to this Privacy Policy will be deemed your acceptance of the changes. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at our email address. We will use commercially acceptable means to promptly notify you of any changes to our Privacy Policy and we will also strive to address your concerns in a timely manner.
